sources: SpiceNest - Top Selling Grocery Products in Saudi Arabia

kabsa.description: Saudi national dish - spiced rice with chicken or lamb

jareesh.description: Saudi national dish - cracked wheat with meat

saleeg.description: Rice cooked with milk - creamy Saudi dish

matazeez.description: Whole wheat dough circles in tomato sauce with meat

samboosa.description: Deep-fried pastry with meat or cheese - Saudi Ramadan favorite

quaker_soup.description: Quaker soup - most popular soup in Saudi during Ramadan

vimto.description: Popular Saudi Ramadan drink - berry and vanilla flavored
